Detailed Description

Definition of a state machine.

This structure contains the basic setup of the state machine. State transitions are defined as a struct of type STATE_TRAN. State actions (cyclically called) are defined as a struct of type STATE_ACTION. Several differently configured state machines can be active at the same time.
